title: Request IRS Account Transcript
description: To investigate a client's tax issue, a tax professional needs to see the client's official IRS account transcript for a specific tax year.

tasks.description: Obtain a signed Form 2848, Power of Attorney, from the client.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent secures the necessary authorization to represent the client.

tasks.description: Access the IRS Practitioner Priority Service to request the client's account transcript.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully uses the professional service to request the transcript.

tasks.description: Receive and save the transcript for analysis.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent downloads and securely stores the client's transcript.
